title: Sustainable Product Design and Manufacturing Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering knowledge, understanding of product development processes, and concepts of environmental/social/economic sustainability
context.additional_context: Advanced training for working professionals to cultivate sustainable analysis competencies applicable to real-world tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can explain ≥3 factors of how raw material selection impacts environmental sustainability during product design.
Learners can perform design optimization using carbon emission analysis tools for manufacturing processes.
Learners can develop a sustainability evaluation matrix considering economic, environmental, and social dimensions.
Learners can identify ≥5 sustainability factors to consider when determining product production locations through global supply chain analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
